item.title: Shop Your Store
item.description: An Android and iOS ecommerce app that gives every user their own “store”, so they can sell their items and other users can “shop their store”. This project is geared at people who want to sell off old clothes and those you don’t have the means to run their own website due to cost. This app was built with the Flutter SDK as the front end and Cloud Firestore as the backend.

item.title: Welcome to Quiz Bowl Team
item.description: What is Quiz Bowl? Quiz Bowl is an academic competition in which two teams compete to answer questions from all areas of knowledge, including history, literature, science, fine arts, current events, pop culture, sports, and more. This video is from the NAQT, which is an organization that provides Quiz Bowl questions. How does Quiz Bowl work? Questions are read by a moderator and players buzz in when they think they know the answer.

item.title: Internshift
item.description: App to aggregate internships and job openings for high school and college age students designed to decrease difficulty in the application process. Internships and jobs at an early age have been shown to increase a student’s success in their designated field. Built using Flutter SDK with Firebase Authentication for the authentication and Cloud Firestore for the Backend. Submitted to Congressional App Challenge under District TX-30 represented by Congresswoman Eddie Bernice Johnson and placed 2nd.

item.title: The Levels of Vehicle Automation in 3 Minutes
item.description: With automation and especially automation in cars becoming more present in everyday life, it is important to know the concepts associated with the new technology that will one day be all around us. Here are the levels of vehicle automation in 3 minutes. Level 0: No Automation These vehicles are the normal everyday cars that are manually controlled and ones that you most likely own. Almost all cars available fall in this category.

item.title: BuzzerBowl
item.description: An app for quizbowl players to practice quiz bowl questions Functionality includes ability to create or join games, practice, live buzzing, and native text-to-speech functionality for iOS, Android, MacOS, and Web. Front end made using the Flutter SDK and backend made using Cloud Firestore Note: This app is in progress

item.title: How to Get Started with Hugo
item.description: This tutorial will explain the steps needed to get started with Hugo to build a static website for your blog or portfolio. What is Hugo? Hugo is a free and open source static site generator used by many to create blogs or portfolio websites for themselves. I myself use Hugo for this portfolio/blog site. Step 1: Installation The easiest way to install Hugo is through Homebrew. I recommend installing Homebrew as it makes downloading apps a lot easier.

item.title: My Favorite Free AND Professional Video-Editing Program
item.description: DaVinci Resolve 17 is a video editing software that is FREE, used by professionals and packs many features that make it a great alternative to Adobe’s Creative Cloud or Apple’s Final Cut. What is DaVinci Resolve? If you take a look at the main video-editing softwares used by professionals, you’re most likely going to see either Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro X. Now to people who can’t spend upwards of $40/month or $300, or for those who do not own an Apple machine, this may not be a viable option.

item.title: Criminal Justice Reform Essay - Negative
item.description: Preface This Essay is one that was submitted in the Dallas Urban Debate Alliance’s essay competition concerning the topic of Criminal Justice Reform. This essay won third place in that competition. Many in the United States have been yearning for a reform in the criminal justice system citing issues such as racism, prevalence of junk methods in forensic science, and harsh, strict sentencing for drug cases. Proponents of criminal justice reform have proposed a plan that states:

item.title: CommonPlace
item.description: An app to connect the community in a neighborhood together. Features include direct messaging, user search, chat rooms, and secure sign in and sign up through Firebase Authentication Built using the Flutter SDK as a frontend and Cloud Firestore as a backend for chatrooms and user data storage

item.title: Porsche Taycan Edit Video
item.description: This was a challenge to edit a video using Youtuber Justin Tse’s footage.

item.title: Portfolio
item.description: This portfolio page was made using Hugo, a static site generator. I made this portfolio to showcase my resume, my projects, and some of thoughts in a blog format.

item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Akhil Peddikuppa and I am currently a sophomore at the School for the Talented and Gifted in Dallas, Texas. I’m 15 years old and intending to study medicine in the future and incorporate my interest of technology with it. I’ve always been interesting in creating my own things whether it be an app, videos, or music. Recently, I’ve been researching peer to peer networking and especially decentralized network protocols with technology like IPFS or the InterPlanetary File System.
